verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; (this is the <S%H776>land<s%> that shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> unto you for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, even the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> with the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> thereof:)

Then your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> shall be from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> along by the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be the outmost <S%H7097>coast<s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%>:

And your <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H5437>turn<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>on<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin<s%>: and the going <S%H8444>forth<s%> thereof shall be from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%>, and shall go <S%H3318>on<s%> to <S%H2692>Hazaraddar<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>on<s%> to <S%H6111>Azmon<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall fetch a <S%H5437>compass<s%> from <S%H6111>Azmon<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And as for the <S%H3220>western<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>, ye shall even have the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> for a <S%H1366>border<s%>: this shall be your <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>.
And this shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>: from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> ye shall point <S%H8376>out<s%> for you <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>:

From <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> ye shall point <S%H8376>out<s%> your border unto the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>forth<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be to <S%H6657>Zedad<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3318>on<s%> to <S%H2202>Ziphron<s%>, and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at <S%H2704>Hazarenan<s%>: this shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>.
And ye shall point <S%H184>out<s%> your <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> from <S%H2704>Hazarenan<s%> to <S%H8221>Shepham<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8221>Shepham<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah<s%>, on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of <S%H5871>Ain<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H3381>descend<s%>, and shall <S%H4229>reach<s%> unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%>: side of the sea: Heb. shoulder of the sea

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>: this shall be your <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H776>land<s%> which ye shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%>:

For the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7206>Reuben<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1425>Gad<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, have <S%H3947>received<s%> their inheritance; and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>:

The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> which shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> unto you: <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.
And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, to <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.
And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> are these: Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>.
And of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H8050>Shemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H449>Elidad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3692>Chislon<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3020>Jogli<s%>.

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H2592>Hanniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H641>Ephod<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8204>Shiphtan<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6535>Parnach<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H6409>Paltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5821>Azzan<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H282>Ahihud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8015>Shelomi<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H6300>Pedahel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>.

These are they whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to divide the <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.
